name: Mvzzle
description: '''Gift Selaelo Morukhuladi''' (born 11 November 1994),  professionally known as '''Mvzzle''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|m|ʌ|ˈ|z|l|}}) is a South African DJ, singer-songwriter, and producer born in [[Musina]] and raised in [[Westenburg]], [[Polokwane]]. He is famous for producing the single "[[Umlilo]]" by [[DJ Zinhle]].
